Name: Master
PhasesDescription: The Master starts in Phase I, and goes into Phase II until the end of the next round when all it's minions are defeated (Great minions do not count).

Actions.Name: Minion Assault
Actions.Effects: Deals 1 additional piercing damage once for every minion adjacent to the target.

Actions.Name: Great Puppeteer
Actions.Description: All allies in a close blast 1 area of the Master may dash 3 spaces, then deal 1 piercing damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Promote
Actions.Description: Destroy one minion and replace it with a Great Minion.

Summons.Name: Great Minion
Summons.SummonActions: 1/round during the Master's turn, it can move 3 spaces and attack an adjacent character.

Phases.Description: When entering Phase II, the Master returns to phase I at the end of the next round.

Actions.Name: Aether Bomb
Actions.Description: Summon a blast 1 terrain effect, which cannot overlap with another Aether bomb. When the Master changes phases, all aether bombs explode and are destroyed. Characters within must save or take 2[D]+[fray] damage, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Reposition
Actions.Description: Shove an adjacent character 1, then dash 2.

Actions.Name: Rally
Actions.Description: The Master creates a Rally Point in range 3.

Summons.Name: Rally Point
Summons.SummonEffects: Aura 1. Minions in the aura are immune to all damage and Minion Assault against characters in the area deals maximum damage.
